ðŸ“– Summary: Pangolin is a self-hosted tunneled reverse proxy server designed to securely expose private resources on distributed networks. It provides features like reverse proxy through WireGuard, identity and access management, a simple dashboard UI, and easy deployment options. Pangolin acts as a central hub, connecting isolated networks through encrypted tunnels, enabling easy access to remote services without opening ports.
